UPDATE email_templates_default_data SET body = 'We have received a request to reset your password for the {$siteTitle} web site.
If you did not make this request, please ignore this email and your password will not be changed. If you wish to reset your password, click on the below URL.
Reset my password: {$url}
{$principalContactSignature}' WHERE email_key = 'PASSWORD_RESET_CONFIRM' AND locale = 'en_US'
